main event: A large dark object was observed rapidly climbing through clouds at high altitude on September 11, 1962.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be 50 to 100 feet in diameter and appeared structured and metallic., It was moving against the wind at a very high rate of speed without any vapor trails or exhaust., Three crew members of the ship observed the object separately at different times., The sighting lasted for several minutes before the object disappeared from view., The observer described it as one of the most unusual and puzzling sightings in many years of seafaring.
